ibis.deploy
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  ibis.deploy.Resource

public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object

Resource, accessible using some sort of middleware. Used to deploy both support processes (like hubs) and jobs (applications) on.

Author:
Niels Drost

getJavaPath

public java.lang.String getJavaPath()
Returns the path of the java executable on this resource. If "null", "java" is used by default.

Returns:
the path of the java executable on this resource, or null if unspecified.

setJavaPath

public void setJavaPath(java.lang.String javaPath)
Sets the path of the java executable on this resource. If set to "null", "java" is used by default.

Parameters:
javaPath - the new path of the java executable on this resource.

getJobWrapperScript

public java.io.File getJobWrapperScript()
Returns the job wrapper script, if any. Useful to start jobs on a resource without any installed middleware. If specified, this script is pre-staged and executed instead of the java command. This script is passed:
  1. The number of nodes to use
  2. The total number of cores to use
  3. the java executable
  4. jvm options, main class and any additional parameters.

Returns:
the job wrapper script.

setJobWrapperScript

public void setJobWrapperScript(java.io.File wrapperScript)
Sets the job wrapper script, if any. Useful to start jobs on a resource without any installed middleware. If specified, this script is pre-staged and executed instead of the java command. This script is passed:
  1. The number of nodes to use
  2. The total number of cores to use
  3. the java executable
  4. jvm options, main class and any additional parameters.

Parameters:
wrapperScript - the job wrapper script.

checkSettings

public void checkSettings(java.lang.String jobName,
                          boolean supportOnly)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Checks if this resource is suitable for deploying. If not, throws an exception.

Parameters:
jobName - name of job
supportOnly - if only the necessary settings for starting a support process need to be checked
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if this resource is incomplete or incorrect.
